name: indigo

having a bluish-purple colour: He was dressed in a black shirt and frayed indigo jeans. A small, indigo bird flitted from one tree branch to another.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had indigo blue overalls. Wash your jeans inside out in cold water to keep the dark indigo colour from fading.The competition judges wore indigo robes and garlands of flowers.
